formfactor (ff)
===============

.. automodule:: jscatter.formfactor
    :noindex:
   
Form Factors
------------

.. autosummary::
    beaucage
    genGuinier

    ornsteinZernike

    polymerCorLength

    ringPolymer
    wormlikeChain

----
